name: Xiao
desc: A yaksha adeptus who defends Liyue. Also heralded as the "Conqueror of Demons" and "Vigilant Yaksha."

voice.title: Hello
voice.desc: If you awake to a knife at your throat, if monsters dig their claws into you, if death comes knocking at your door... Call out my name. Adeptus Xiao. I will be here when you call.

voice.title: Chat: Idleness
voice.desc: Reduced to just standing around... How absurd.

voice.title: Chat: Wandering Spirits
voice.desc: The damned will sooner die again than lay a hand on me.

voice.title: Chat: Corruption
voice.desc: Grrgh... Those memories, so dark...

voice.title: When It Rains
voice.desc: Demons do not stop for the rain. Move.

voice.title: After the Rain
voice.desc: The rain stopped? I don't concern myself with the weather.

voice.title: When Thunder Strikes
voice.desc: Many mortals fear lightning... Incomprehensible. Fear of something so common.

voice.title: When It Snows
voice.desc: Once the snow is thick enough, we can eat it...

voice.title: Good Morning
voice.desc: We're wasting time. Let's go.

voice.title: Good Afternoon
voice.desc: Lunch... We'll go back to Wangshu Inn.

voice.title: Good Evening
voice.desc: Night... When the darkness comes to envelop you. Don't stay outside.

voice.title: Good Night
voice.desc: Go. I'll be here.

voice.title: About Xiao: Inhuman
voice.desc: I'm far from human. I can't make much of human emotions.

voice.title: About Xiao: Liyue
voice.desc: Liyue is changing. Rapidly... Forget it. It means nothing to me.

voice.title: About Us: Warnings
voice.desc: If a day comes where even you are taken by the darkness, it will be up to me...

voice.title: About Us: Trust
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

Do not fall prey to the darkness. I have no mercy.
Though, perhaps you can stand your ground alone.

voice.title: About Us: Drowsiness
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

Who's there? Oh... You think I sleep? You have no respect for the ways of the adepti.

voice.title: About Us: Lantern Rite
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

The Lantern Rite? The time for humans to discard their glowing trash into the sea has returned... How childish...
Though, if you insist... I will go with you.

voice.title: About the Vision: Desires
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 3

Visions? Desire? Ha. Do not judge adepti by your mortal ideals. I have no desire.

voice.title: About the Vision: Reasons
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 5

Hiding? I'm hiding nothing. I just won't speak of desire to others.
Do you mortals not have a rule about spoken wishes never coming true? Hm? What do you mean that's not the same?

voice.title: Something to Share
voice.desc: I deal in death. If you cannot bring yourself to kill — speak my name.

voice.title: Interesting things
voice.desc:
Dihua Islet was once deserted.
Though that was many decades... no, centuries ago...

voice.title: About Zhongli
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Complete "A New Star Approaches"

Can I ask... Zhongli — what does he do with his days? Huh? Birds, antiques, flowers...
Hmm... What deeper meaning do they hold?

voice.title: About Beidou
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Beidou? I have nothing to do with her. Though there is such a thing as the leviathan. As a mere human, she has proven her power in defeating Haishan.

voice.title: About Baizhu
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

You want... Baizhu to make a medicine to take away my pain? I understand your intentions, but mortal medicine has no effect on adepti.

voice.title: About Hu Tao
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Hu Tao? Her liveliness is irritating. Fortunately, she is also humorous, so you need not worry about her growing into a boring human.

voice.title: About Venti
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Venti? So that's the name he goes by. His tunes are... forget it.

voice.title: About Ganyu
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Ganyu is neither mortal nor illuminated beast. Wandering both the mortal and adepti realms with duty as her sole guide, it was inevitable that she would become perplexed... What? Me? You believe a yaksha who knows nothing more than how to massacre countless souls and emerge unscathed is a suitable mentor for such an individual? ...Your mind occupies a very different world from that which your body inhabits.

voice.title: About Shenhe
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Complete "The Crane Returns on the Wind"

It seems Shenhe places a great deal of trust in you. Well, how could she not. There are few people in the world as kind and good-natured as you.

voice.title: About Yelan
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

I've heard that she once investigated The Chasm, following the trail of the Millelith. If she can investigate mysteries like that on her own, she must be someone of rare skill.

voice.title: More About Xiao: I
voice.desc:
I'm willing to protect you.
But don't think about getting close, and stay out of my way, or all that awaits you is regret.

voice.title: More About Xiao: II
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 3

In the thousands of years that have passed, I have taken countless wraiths. If you want no trouble, stay away from me. See me as a weapon, and nothing more.

voice.title: More About Xiao: III
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Their voices... I can always hear them. Their screams, their cries, demanding more death...
This is my burden to carry. It has nothing to do with you.

voice.title: More About Xiao: IV
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 5

Morax...? What do you know of this name!?
He gave me the name Xiao, and released me from the endless pain I endured.
I will not forgive those that dare to speak against him, even you.

voice.title: More About Xiao: V
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

It's too late. The connection between us is too strong. Even if you wanted to, it's too late to sever it. Hm? You've never thought to sever it?
*sigh* This eternal dance of demon subjugation... My fight goes on.
But, I would like to know more about you.

voice.title: Xiao's Hobbies
voice.desc:
There's nothing timid about you, having the courage to ask about my hobbies.
So, fight me. How long do you think your body will last against my blows?

voice.title: Xiao's Troubles
voice.desc: Trouble? Ha. Trouble means nothing to adepti. There is no trouble that can last for a thousand years.

voice.title: Favorite Food: Almond Tofu
voice.desc: I have no interest in mortal food. Cooking is tedious and the wait is long. The one thing I can manage to stomach is almond tofu.

voice.title: Favorite Food: Memories
voice.desc: The taste of Almond Tofu feels like a fond dream...

voice.title: Least Favorite Food
voice.desc: Wait. I am expected to place slices of meat in wrappings myself? And then... eat them? Together? Ugh, humans these days do not know what they are doing.

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: I
voice.desc: Mm... Not bad... Why are you staring at me?

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: II
voice.desc: No need.

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: III
voice.desc: Try something else next time.

voice.title: Birthday
voice.desc:
This mortal concept of commemorating the day of your birth really is redundant. Ahem. Wait. Uhh, have this. It's a butterfly I made from leaves.
Okay. Take it. It's an adepti amulet — it staves off evil.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Intro
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Ascension Phase 1

This is it? Nothing worth getting excited about.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Ascension Phase 2

New power? All it will be used for is death.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Climax
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Ascension Phase 4

The limit to one's power is self-destruction. Answer me. Why do you persist?

voice.title: Feelings about Ascension: Conclusion
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Ascension Phase 6

Countless souls have fallen prey to these hands. I too have been swallowed by the darkness — and yet you dare to drive me on. You may think of me as... your companion. You seek to find me salvation?
...You... really are a difficult being to comprehend.

voice.title: Elemental Skill: I
voice.desc: Hmph.

voice.title: Elemental Skill: II
voice.desc: Boring.

voice.title: Elemental Skill: III
voice.desc: Useless.

voice.title: Plunging Attacks: I
voice.desc: Here!

voice.title: Plunging Attacks: II
voice.desc: Worthless!

voice.title: Elemental Burst: I
voice.desc: Disappear!

voice.title: Elemental Burst: II
voice.desc: Evil conquering!

voice.title: Elemental Burst: III
voice.desc: Lament!

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: I
voice.desc: If it's useful, I'll take it.

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: II
voice.desc: Why would anyone want... *sigh* Forget it, it's not my concern.

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: III
voice.desc: Hmph... there's quality here.

voice.title: Low HP: I
voice.desc: Shut it.

voice.title: Low HP: II
voice.desc: Prepare to die, fool!

voice.title: Low HP: III
voice.desc: *grunts* Good.

voice.title: Ally at Low HP: I
voice.desc: ...Weak.

voice.title: Ally at Low HP: II
voice.desc: Get back if you wanna survive.

voice.title: Fallen: I
voice.desc: Is this... retribution?

voice.title: Fallen: II
voice.desc: The day... has finally come.

voice.title: Fallen: III
voice.desc: Impossible...

voice.title: Light Hit Taken: I
voice.desc: That's it?

voice.title: Heavy Hit Taken: I
voice.desc: Ugh, get out of my way!

voice.title: Joining Party: I
voice.desc: You called?

voice.title: Joining Party: II
voice.desc: Evil shall be dispersed.

voice.title: Joining Party: III
voice.desc: Conquering demons is what I do.

imgDesc.text:
Original Outfit - Endurer of Eons
Xiao's outfit. Classical battle-wear fit for a thousand years of evil-conquering.

desc.text: Increases <color=#ffd780>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color> 's charges by 1.
When in the party and not on the field, Xiao's Energy Recharge is increased by 25%.

Increases the Level of <color=#ffd780>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
When Xiao's HP falls below 50%, he gains a 100% DEF Bonus.

Increases the Level of <color=#ffd780>Bane of All Evil</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

While under the effects of <color=#ffd780>Bane of All Evil</color> , hitting at least 2 opponents with Xiao's Plunging Attack will immediately grant him 1 charge of <color=#ffd780>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color> , and for the next 1s, he may use Lemniscatic Wind Cycling while ignoring its CD.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>February 21, 2020</color>
Guardian Yaksha
For the people of Liyue Harbor, when it comes to the enlightened Adepti living in Jueyunjian, one name stands out above the rest. When the festivals arrive, the people light incense and pray, asking for the protection of the Adepti.
But they don't pray to Xiao.
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1230705683319771136</color>

<color=#ffd780>February 23, 2020</color>
"The taste of Almond Tofu feels like a fond dream..." —Xiao's comment towards Wangshu Inn's Almond Tofu.
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1231549293829533698</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 27, 2021</color>
"By honoring his oath as a yaksha, one hopes that our fellow adeptus has now finally gained some respite from the grievances that have burdened him all these millennia." — Adeptus Streetward Rambler comments ruefully during a game of chess
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/152761</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 27, 2021</color>
Travelers \ (^ o ^) / ~
Today, we'd like to introduce "Vigilant Yaksha" Xiao to you all!
His youthful appearance belies his over two thousand years of age. "Adeptus Xiao. I will be here when you call."
Click to view full image
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/152814</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 27, 2021</color>
"I'm willing to protect you. But don't think about getting close, and stay out of my way, or all that awaits you is regret."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/152938</color>

<color=#ffd780>February 10, 2021</color>
1. The Vigilant Yaksha Is Born: A Character Woven From Cultural Symbolism
2. A Young Adeptus: Detail-Based Design
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/180703</color>

<color=#ffd780>April 17, 2020</color>
My birthday? No-one has celebrated it in a thousand years, so how did you... There is no need to fret.
This was a human custom from the first. But if you must... let us go and have a bowl of almond tofu.
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1250997438271254528</color>

<color=#ffd780>April 17, 2021</color>
A vantage point to view the scenery together... This is the location you've chosen? The swirling sea of clouds will make for a beautiful sight to admire with you. You have my thanks.
Why don't I use my Adeptus Art to swiftly scale the mountain? I think that the trip with you may create more memories.
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/301947</color>

<color=#ffd780>April 17, 2021</color>
"Almond Tofu and Grilled Tiger Fish... Do you think Xiao will like our surprise?"
"Shh, not so loud, Paimon! Also, you're drooling onto the table!"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/301945</color>

<color=#ffd780>April 17, 2022</color>
This leaf was sticking to your clothes, so I removed it for you.
You want to keep it? I see...
Holding on to something that goes with the wind seems unnecessary. But... you can have it.
Thanks to hou for the fantastic artwork!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/4299110</color>

<color=#ffd780>April 17, 2022</color>
"Xiao! We brought freshly-made Almond Tofu, do you want to ea—"
"Paimon, shhh..."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/4299111</color>

<color=#ffd780>April 17, 2023</color>
"After all this time I spent with you, it seems I unwittingly started to look forward to my own birthday too."
"I'll take good care of your gift."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/17768274</color>

<color=#ffd780>April 17, 2023</color>
The people at Wangshu Inn claim that many tourists come to Dihua Marsh during this season.
It might be that they wish to admire the scenery at a time when everything is flourishing.
Even still, I have to stay alert. The monsters will be getting more active as well.
There is nothing out of the ordinary about today, until I saw you in the distance.
With that being so... After finishing this Almond Tofu, would you like to go on patrol with me?
Thanks to hou for the fantastic artwork!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/17768288</color>

<color=#ffd780>April 17, 2024</color>
We've known each other for a long time, so just act normal. No need for anything special.
This place is unusually tranquil, and you can survey all of Dihua Marsh at a glance... Only you could have found such a place.
This Qingxin is for you. Decorating your home with it would surely add a touch of freshness.
Thanks to DSマイル for the fantastic artwork!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/27303635</color>

<color=#ffd780>April 17, 2025</color>
"You called out my name... just to celebrate my birthday? Hmph. Fine, I'll indulge you this time. Let's celebrate together."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/38289209</color>

<color=#ffd780>April 17, 2025</color>
Resting on this boat together with you, listening to the sound of the wind rustling through the lotus leaves... It calms my spirit.
So this is what mortals mean when they say to "kick back and relax." Hmm.
It's a strange feeling... But having you here makes it feel less strange.
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/38289210</color>

<color=#ffd780>February 18, 2021</color>
May everyone's wishes come true amid the glow of a sea of Xiao Lanterns!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/193271</color>

<color=#ffd780>March 26, 2021</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Chinese]</color>
Genshin Impact mobile wallpapers has been updated!
<color=#ffacff>Miyoshe:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.miyoushe.com/ys/article/5161090</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 21, 2021</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Chinese]</color>
We tried to make the dim sum you mentioned, but I don't know if it is the same as the one from your memories? I also tried making a Qingxin flavor one, please give it a try?
Thanks to the artist: hou
<color=#ffacff>Bilibili:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.bilibili.com/opus/572770649555209085</color>

<color=#ffd780>October 31, 2021</color>
Pumpkins, Ghosts, Bats...What is happening?
Everyone across Teyvat has suddenly changed their attire.
I wonder how Hilichurls are dressed during this time...
Click image to view full wallpaper
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/Paimon2theMoon/status/1454659396512796678</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 4, 2022</color>
"There you are, Xiao~ Look, this is the snowman we just made in Dragonspine. Isn't he cute?
... (in a hushed voice) Xiao isn't saying anything. Does he not like snowmen?"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/1852179</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 31, 2022</color>
Thinking back, we've come a long, long way! We traveled really far, explored so many places, and met lots of new friends! Paimon will always be with you, and be your best companion~ Dearest Traveler, adventuring is hard work, let's feast together!
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1487999076503363587</color>

<color=#ffd780>May 31, 2022</color>
"This must be the temple in honor of Pervases the Yaksha, let's go in and offer incense~"
"Yay, we finally found it! I hope I can grow up to be as strong as the yaksha!"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/5055062</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 27, 2023</color>
Thank you for your hard work, Adeptus Xiao. Please excuse my lack of hospitality and accommodation.
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/15602159</color>

<color=#ffd780>March 14, 2023</color>
Thank you for being willing to recount your travels to me. Though there were some close calls, it seems your journey went well.
I have no special anecdotes with which to return the favor... Take this bag of snacks as instead.
They say that this dessert can restore one's energy, though I do not know if it is to your taste.
Take it with you. You can eat it later if you wish.
Thanks to DSマイル for the fantastic artwork!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/17002592</color>

<color=#ffd780>October 6, 2023</color>
Click image to view full wallpaper
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/22139752</color>

<color=#ffd780>February 15, 2024</color>
That special time of year has descended upon us once more. Let us enjoy the enchanting sights of the Lantern Rite together.
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/25261279</color>

<color=#ffd780>May 31, 2025</color>
"Would you like to help us wrap rice dumplings? Qiqi will teach you... First, fold a corner, and then— And then... What was it again..."
"Like this."
"It doesn't matter if you can't remember. I'll just help to wrap a few more."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/39072981</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 16, 2020</color>
Located in the east of Teyvat, Liyue is a bountiful harbor with unique architectural style, bountiful landscape and rich natural heritage. Travelers, now it's time for you to explore and uncover the many mysteries that shroud this Eastern fantasy city.
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/129</color>
Genshin Impact for PlayStation®5 Is Here

<color=#ffd780>April 28, 2021</color>
Dear Travelers, the native PlayStation®5 version of Genshin Impact is now available for download!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/328294</color>

<color=#ffd780>August 13, 2023</color>
Neither dwell on your regrets, nor fret over what the future holds.
This melody has witnessed all seasons and climes, settling at last like morning dew in a dream.
Melodies of an Endless Journey will soon resound anew...
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/20836850</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 19, 2025</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Chinese]</color>
The mountains and rivers are full of spirits, and we will travel together in the new year!
<color=#ffacff>Bilibili:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.bilibili.com/opus/1024009540840980485</color>

Xiao continually loses HP once his <color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color> is activated.
<color=#ffd780>Yaksha's Mask</color> greatly increases Xiao's jumping ability and also:
Increases his attack AoE and attack DMG.
Converts attack DMG into <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> , which cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion.
While under the effects of <color=#ffd780>Bane of All Evil</color> , all DMG dealt by Xiao increases by 5%.
Xiao ascends with <color=#ffd780>CRIT Rate</color> <color=#ffffff73>.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Xiao's burst cost is 70 energy.</color>

customize.name: White Tassel
customize.desc: A standard-issue weapon of the Millelith soldiers. It has a sturdy shaft and sharp spearhead. It's a reliable weapon.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Base ATK</color>
401
<color=#ffffff>CRIT Rate</color>
23.4%
<color=#ffffff>Source</color>
Treasure Chests from Liyue
The White Tassel provides CRIT Rate to allow for Xiao to deal more DMG. It's passive increases <color=#ffe699>Normal Attack DMG</color> <color=#ffffff73>, which Xiao cannot make much use of, as most of his damage comes from</color> <color=#ffe699>Plunge DMG.</color>

customize.name: Blackcliff Pole
customize.desc: A weapon made of blackcliff and aerosiderite. There is a dark crimson glow on its cold black sheen.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Base ATK</color>
519
<color=#ffffff>CRIT DMG</color>
55.1%
<color=#ffffff>Source</color>
Starglitter Exchange
Blackcliff Pole provides Xiao with <color=#ffd780>CRIT DMG</color> , and its passive grants increased <color=#ffe699>ATK</color> <color=#ffffff73>up to 3 stacks within 30 seconds after defeating an enemy</color> . The <color=#ffe699>CRIT DMG</color> synergies with Xiao's <color=#ffe699>CRIT Rate</color> ascension.

customize.name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
customize.desc: A jade polearm made by the archons, capable of slaying ancient beasts.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Base ATK</color>
674
<color=#ffffff>CRIT Rate</color>
22.1%
<color=#ffffff>Source</color>
Wish
The main entry's <color=#ffd780>High ATK</color> provides Xiao with an increase in damage along with the secondary entry, <color=#ffd780>CRIT Rate</color> . Xiao can make great use of the passive entry which increases <color=#ffd780>ATK</color> when hitting the enemy at a of max 7 stacks. While in possession of the max stacks, the <color=#ffd780>High</color> <color=#ffd780>ATK</color> can still be increased. It matches the talent of Xiao and is suitable for long-term on-field output.

customize.name: Staff of Homa
customize.desc: A "firewood staff" that was once used in ancient and long-lost rituals.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Base ATK</color>
608
<color=#ffffff>CRIT DMG</color>
66.2%
<color=#ffffff>Source</color>
Wish
Staff of Homa provides Xiao with increase damage through it's <color=#ffd780>CRIT DMG</color> and <color=#ffd780>High ATK</color> . Additionally the passive entry increases <color=#ffd780>HP</color> , and provides an <color=#ffd780>ATK Bonus</color> based on the <color=#ffd780>Max HP</color> . When Xiao's <color=#ffd780>HP</color> is less than 50%, the <color=#ffd780>ATK</color> is further increased based on the <color=#ffd780>Max HP</color> . The constant loss of HP during the use of Elemental Burst by Xiao makes it easier to get the extra <color=#ffd780>ATK Bonus</color> for low HP in the passive.

<color=#ffffff>Set Bonus</color>
ATK +18%
Increases ATK when character's HP decreases
The Vermillion Hereafter set increases Xiao's <color=#ffd780>ATK</color> <color=#ffffff73>to increase his overall</color> <color=#ffd780>DMG</color> <color=#ffffff73>. After conducting an</color> <color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color> <color=#ffffff73>, the 4-piece bonus increases the</color> <color=#ffd780>ATK</color> <color=#ffffff73>by 8%. As Xiao's HP decreases, the 4-piece bonus will also grant an increase of</color> <color=#ffd780>ATK</color> by 10%. This set is the most optimal for Xiao, as since it provides a great deal of <color=#ffd780>ATK</color> , it will be more simple to focus on other stats such as <color=#ffd780>CRIT Rate</color> <color=#ffffff73>,</color> <color=#ffd780>CRIT DMG</color> <color=#ffffff73>,</color> <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> <color=#ffffff73>, and</color> <color=#ffd780>Energy Recharge</color> <color=#ffffff73>.</color>

<color=#ffffff>Set Bonus</color>
ATK +18%
Anemo DMG +15%
Energy Recharge +20%
Use any of these 2-piece/2-piece combinations to maximize Xiao's <color=#ffd780>ATK</color> , <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> , <color=#ffd780>CRIT Rate</color> , <color=#ffd780>CRIT DMG</color> <color=#ffffff73>, and</color> <color=#ffd780>Energy Recharge</color> .

value.name: Xiao: Mask
value.desc:
Namecard style.
He longs for a day to come when he will wear the mask and dance — not to conquer demons, but to the tune of that flute amid a sea of flowers.

value.name: "Sweet Dream"
value.desc: Xiao's specialty. His dream is very simple, and it is merely a lovely dream.

value.name: Xiao
value.desc:
"Vigilant Yaksha" Xiao

The Vigilant Yaksha, the bane of all evil

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 6 consecutive spear strikes.
<color=#ffd780>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to perform an upward thrust.
<color=#ffd780>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.
Xiao does not take DMG from performing Plunging Attacks.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Teachings of Prosperity
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Prosperity is the people's pursuit in the land of Geo.
Prosperity is the blessing of Liyue, it is the foundation of the great city built by the gods and the people of Liyue, and it is the source of the peace and safety of the land.

materials.name: Slime Condensate
materials.desc: A thick coating found on slimes. Most commonly seen material in elemental workshops.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Guide to Prosperity
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Prosperity is the people's pursuit in the land of Geo.
Prosperity is the promise made by Liyue to its children: To repay the hard-working laborers with enough gold to brighten up this land.

materials.name: Slime Secretions
materials.desc: Mildly purified slime secretions. Harmful to the skin. Please avoid direct exposure.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Philosophies of Prosperity
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Prosperity is the people's pursuit in the land of Geo.
Prosperity is Liyue's past, present, and future. This prosperity is unmatched and unobtainable by any other nations — it all belongs to Liyue and its inhabitants.

materials.name: Slime Concentrate
materials.desc: Concentrated slime essence. When left alone, it will begin to move on its own.

materials.name: Shadow of the Warrior
materials.desc:
A fragment of power that you obtained from defeating Childe, who had unleashed the might of his Delusion.
It is the product of a will to fight that has been honed over countless slaughters.
If humans do indeed have destinies, then his must surely have been twisted by such deeds. Why else, then, would he always be at the heart of every conflict?

materials.name: Crown of Insight
materials.desc:
A precious Talent Level-Up material.
Once a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now, wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech. Nevertheless, this Crown of Insight must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.

desc.text:
Xiao lunges forward, dealing <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> to opponents in his path.
Can be used in mid-air.
Starts with 2 charges.
According to the legends of another land, the world will someday be crushed by two great wind wheels. Xiao's mastery over polearms is transcendent, ripping his foes apart like those legendary wind wheels.

Xiao dons the Yaksha Mask that set gods and demons trembling millennia ago.
<color=#ffd780>Yaksha's Mask</color>
· Greatly increases Xiao's jumping ability.
· Increases his attack AoE and attack DMG.
· Converts attack DMG into <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> , which cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion.
In this state, Xiao will continuously lose HP.
The effects of this skill end when Xiao leaves the field.
Donning the Mask of the Yaksha, Xiao takes the terrifying, demon-conquering form of the Vigilant Yaksha. But this great power has also brought him great suffering. Some call him "The Bane of All Evil."

talent.key: Conqueror of Evil: Tamer of Demons
talent.title: Conqueror of Evil: Tamer of Demons

desc.text:
While under the effects of <color=#ffd780>Bane of All Evil</color> , all DMG dealt by Xiao increases by 5%. DMG increases by a further 5% for every 3s the ability persists.
The maximum DMG Bonus is 25%.

Using <color=#ffd780>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color> increases the DMG of subsequent uses of Lemniscatic Wind Cycling by 15%.
This effect lasts for 7s, and has a maximum of 3 stacks. Gaining a new stack refreshes the effect's duration.

Decreases climbing Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

Xiao may have the appearance of a young man, but his true age is something over two thousand years.
Fortunately, people do not tend to underestimate him on the basis of his appearance — one only needs to spend a short time with Xiao to clarify that he is not someone to be trifled with.
Xiao is a man of few words. He is highly dangerous, and has the most piercing gaze you've ever seen.
He enjoys a formidable reputation and high level of seniority among the adepti, but is relatively unknown in the mortal realm.
This is inevitable. Xiao is not one of those popular deities to whom people pray for wealth and protection, nor is he a mystical sage of Jueyun Karst to whom pilgrims flock in search of divine wisdom.
No... If any mortal witnesses Xiao unleashing his true power, it is certain to be under the direst of circumstances — and they will be extremely lucky if they survive the ordeal.
This is not because Xiao seeks to harm people. Rather, since Xiao wages a constant war against dark forces powerful enough to devour Liyue in its entirety, any bystanders who witness him in the heat of battle are likely to end up as collateral damage.
Not that this is a secret worth going around silencing witnesses for.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 2</color>
What exactly is Xiao wrestling with?
The tactful answer would be old grudges, unfulfilled dreams, the lamentations of the vanquished...
The unmitigated truth is that Xiao fights against the remnants of the defeated gods from the Archon War, which took place prior to the rise of The Seven.
Morax defeated those gods and buried their remains beneath the rocks of the earth.
However, gods are immortal. Their consciousness may diminish, but their power and hatred will always remain and spread like poison, relentlessly stirring up chaos for the world and its inhabitants.
Liyue's rulers, who are aware of the truth regarding Xiao, refer to him in his millennia-long experience as the "Bane of All Evil."
The war he fights can never be won, and will never come to an end.
It is also an invisible war that no one will ever witness or thank him for.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 3</color>
Xiao is not this yaksha's true name, but a name given to him in the interests of his own protection.
Back in a younger, more naive time, a god had gotten a hold of Xiao's weakness and forced him to serve as their bloodhound, in which capacity he was forced to perform cruel and violent acts.
Many died at his hand, many hopes were crushed, and he was even forced into devouring his victims' dreams. As much as it pained him to do this, he was helpless to resist.
Finally, on the battlefield of the Archon War, Morax, the Geo Archon, had a fateful encounter with the yaksha's master.
The current state of the world has already revealed the results of that battle.
Rex Lapis liberated the yaksha and gave him the name "Xiao."
"In the fables of another land, the name Xiao is that of a spirit who encountered great suffering and hardship. He endured much suffering, as you have. Use this name from now on."

To repay his debt of gratitude to the Geo Archon, Xiao shouldered the burden of protecting Liyue in the millennia that followed.
His past of service under the evil god had rid Xiao of his innocence and gentleness. All that remained within him was the means to kill and the weight of his sins.
<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4</color>
The only way he could be of service to mortals was in doing battle.
But what could people do for him in return?
No ordinary person would ever stop to ask such a question. The sight of Xiao, even far off in the distance, was intimidating enough to send people instantly running for their lives.
That said... if ever someone did want to show some appreciation for Xiao, there is perhaps one thing they could try.
There is a certain secret agent of the Qixing who is tasked with supporting Xiao in subduing demons. That secret agent runs a front organization called the Wangshu Inn.
Occasionally, Xiao stops by the inn for a bowl of Almond Tofu, and if you could see the look on his face when he eats it... there's no mistaking it — he clearly loves the stuff.
Nonetheless, it is not the sweet taste that Xiao hankers after. It's the texture he finds irresistible — apparently, it's very similar to that of the dreams he used to devour.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 5</color>
What exactly is Xiao wrestling with?
To those in Liyue's corridors of power, Xiao's battle is against the evil manifestations produced by the remnants of defeated gods.
However, if you asked Xiao the same question, he may well give you an entirely different answer.
Xiao was once enslaved by an evil god and suffered immensely under their rule until finally regaining his freedom thanks to Rex Lapis.
Xiao's powers were highly regarded by the adepti and he seemed to vanquish all manner of evil demons with consummate ease.
But the evil gods also held immense power, and their lust for revenge ran deeper than mere mortals could ever contemplate. Xiao relentlessly slaughtered the endless, impure manifestations of their vengeful souls, but in doing so, he caused them to fracture. Eventually, these fragments of their hatred were able to taint Xiao's own soul.
The only way to eradicate such hatred is to accept the karmic debt it brings. The magnitude of the bad karma Xiao has accumulated over the years is enough to consume flesh, bone, and soul alike.
And yet, Xiao does not feel any hatred. Having lived for over two thousand years, no single karmic debt constitutes anything more than a fleeting memory.
No grudge can last a thousand years, nor is any debt so great that it cannot be paid off in this time.
Xiao has spent many long years alone.
But his battles have never been in vain.
Because ultimately, the one with whom Xiao wrestles is himself.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6</color>
What does Xiao fight against?
The Traveler understands very well that Xiao fights against the darkness that threatens Liyue. He fights to defend Liyue.
But who will defend him?
There was once when most of Xiao's strength was spent fighting from dusk till dawn, with him emerging victorious by a mere hair.
The reeds in the fields had been sliced to ribbons in the fierce fighting. Plucking his spear from where it had been planted in the ground, Xiao began the trek home.
Well, one says "home" — yet, where did Xiao have to return to? He was merely leaving the battlefield.
Long exhausted, Xiao felt the divine hatred that tainted his body take effect.
Limitless hate flooded his senses, and he fell to the ground in agony.
But it was also at that moment that the pain vanished without warning.
This was not by Xiao's own strength, for he had been rescued by the sound of a flute.
The clear, lovely sound of the flute came over the mountains and rivers, carried on the wind to where he lay.
And clear it continued to ring till the first light of dawn brought with it the startled flight of distant birds.
It protected Xiao, massaging his wild senses, and giving him a moment's peace.
Who was playing this music? Xiao was curious but did not pursue the matter. For he already had something approaching an answer.
The last person who could help him was one of The Seven themselves. So this person, too, must be—

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4</color>
A scholar of the Sumeru Akademiya once did folklore studies in Liyue, the result of which was a book called "Tour of the Land of Liyue," with separate editions being available in Sumeru and Liyue.
"Hidden Diamond and Cloudy Moon: Wonders and Folklores of Liyue" is the version available in Liyue, and has had many mystical and magical portions removed.
The "Ode to Windborne Wraith" is one of the mystical chapters that remain recorded within the complete version at the Akademiya.
The document mentions that though the yaksha were mighty and upright among the adepti, they were bound by their own karma to suffer great horrors and tribulations. As such, they wandered the land in a state of unending suffering.
The chapter lists many methods of comforting the yaksha, such as food offerings, holy chants, and the like. These would appease the yaksha and help them to continue defending the peace.
As noble warriors among adepti, the yaksha would often descend upon the battlefield in person. However, as conflicts grew over the millennia, they have almost been wiped out. Today, large statues of the yaksha subduing demons remain within Liyue's borders, but they have had their features destroyed.
By the by, the language used in that text was so meandering, and its contents so dense, that it sold far fewer copies than the Teyvat Travel Guide and the international cultural summaries written by El Musk.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6</color>
All adepti are known as the "mighty and illuminated" adepti, and this "illumination" refers to the light of a third "eye" that they possess: a Vision.
But do adepti receive their Visions as a form of acknowledgment from Celestia, like humans do?
Xiao no longer remembers the moment he received his Vision. To humans, this would be an unforgettable event. But for him, this was just the beginning of his endless battle.
The thing that Xiao truly cannot forget is something different.
There are a great many human festivals, and few remember the stories behind them.
The greater part of these days coincide with occasions where man-eating monsters were defeated by the adepti host. People imitated their deeds and staged exorcism rituals to remember their ancient heroism, with these practices eventually evolving into celebratory festivals.
The hatred and residual might of many of the gods defeated by Morax throughout Liyue will sometimes erupt with abnormal force amid their half-awake, half-dreaming state. Among them, the eruption that takes place during the Lantern Rite is the most extreme in scale.
Xiao has his mission to perform the time-honored "Nuo Dance of Evil Conquering," and so he fights night and day during the Lantern Rite. Thus, he has come to hate it.
Now, Xiao did not consider battle dangerous. It was due to his hard work that Liyue was kept safe. People lit their lanterns, and the blessed lights shone across the night sky and the nearshore.
At that moment, another special feeling blossomed in Xiao's heart. Loneliness? Peace? Or was it his fears for the future? The young-seeming adeptus searched his heart, only to find no answers.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Vayuda Turquoise Sliver
materials.desc: Character Ascension Material.

materials.name: Qingxin
materials.desc: A translucent white flower that only grows on the highest stone peaks. It eschews the warmth and moisture of the plains to gaze out afar from the solitary mountaintops.

materials.name: Slime Condensate
materials.desc: A thick coating found on slimes. Most commonly seen material in elemental workshops.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Vayuda Turquoise Fragment
materials.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Still, the winds change direction."

materials.name: Juvenile Jade
materials.desc:
A crystalline substance taken from a Primo Geovishap. Within it is contained the potential to become a dragon.
These dull crystals are precipitated within the bodies of vishaps sleeping in the mountains. Liyue folklore holds that they will gather power over many years, after which this crystal will, at last, replace their original heart, and the vishap will become a true dragon — one that can shake the mountains and split the earth.
